name: Blood Pigeon
description:
You are a Blood Pigeon- a bird who (sadly) was killed.  Navigate through the afterlife and do whatever it takes to claw your way back to life so you can see your true love.

(This is a demo of a game that was supposed to be 4x as long, but life got in the way.)

MOUSE REQUIRED!

Leave a comment if the file isn't working so I can try to fix it!

Enjoy :)
